thread.title: Fox's app just froze during the most pivotal moment of the Super Bowl, so everyone started watching in Spanish
thread.title_full: Fox's app just froze during the most pivotal moment of the Super Bowl, so everyone started watching in Spanish

author: Ashley Lutz
title: Fox's app just froze during the most pivotal moment of the Super Bowl, so everyone started watching in Spanish
text:
By the fourth quarter of the Super Bowl, the New England Patriots had made a stunning comeback Â and were trailing the Atlanta Falcons by just one touchdown.Â 
But it was a moment people watching on Fox's app couldn't witness.Â 
The app froze during the pivotal part of the game, prompting outrage on social media. 
A d then the Fox Sports GO app for Xbox dies just in time to miss that epic catch #FML #SuperBowl @FOXSportsGOHelp â Kaleigh Griffin (@Kaleighgriff) February 6, 2017 
ManyÂ resorted to watching the Spanish version of the app's livestream, which was working.Â 
Alright for the Fox Sports Go app in Spanish coming in clutch đđž â Toussaintđđž (@mtoussaint32) February 6, 2017 
Â 
My friggin fox app quit so I had to switch to Spanish. Pats scored while I was buffering but THESE announcers are mucho caliente!đĽ â Gwendolyn Tavira (@Gwendolyn0826) February 6, 2017 
Â A few minutes later, the app seemed to be up and running.Â
